name: earthquaqapp
description: The Earthquake Relief App is a web-based platform dedicated to providing immediate support and assistance to communities affected by earthquakes. Our application offers real-time information on earthquake events, helps users locate affected areas, and facilitates coordination of relief efforts. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, we aim to connect volunteers, organizations, and those in need, fostering solidarity and efficient disaster response.

scripts.render-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

author: younes raymond
